createToken(string,string).details: Creates a new ERC20 token WITHOUT the initial supplyThe token is owned by the caller of this functionThe minter is the caller of this functionDecimals is set to 18The token must be mintable by default

returns._0: The address of the newly created token

createTokenWithInitialSupply(string,stri.details: Creates a new ERC20 token WITH the initial supplyThe token is owned by the caller of this functionThe minter is the caller of this functionDecimals is set to 18

params.initialSupply: The initial supply of tokens to be minted
params.isMintable: Whether the token is mintable or not
params.recipient: The address to receive the initial supply of tokens

returns._0: The address of the newly created token

createTokenWithInitialSupplyAndDecimals(.details: Creates a new ERC20 token WITH the initial supplyThe token is owned by the caller of this functionThe minter is the caller of this function

params.decimals_: The number of decimals for the token
params.initialSupply: The initial supply of tokens to be minted
params.isMintable: Whether the token is mintable or not
params.recipient: The address to receive the initial supply of tokens

returns._0: The address of the newly created token
